name: Nettle
description:
Our vision is to reward the billions of people making recommendations every day by democratising the influencer industry.

For conscious consumers, who already make billions of recommendations every day, Nettle is a rewards platform that pays users cash for the recommendations they make to their friends. 

For businesses, Nettle offers customer acquisition at a set cost incentivising and capturing true word of mouth.

team.name: Edley Naylor-Leyland
team.bioHtml: Founder @Nettle • Formerly in Fintech @Growth Street

jobs.title: Tech Co-Founder and CTO For AdTech Startup
jobs.description:
We’re looking for a technical co-founder to join Nettle and help build disrupt the way brands acquire customers.

-------------

What is Nettle?

Our vision is to reward the billions of people making recommendations every day by democratising the influencer & affiliate industry.

For conscious consumers, who already make billions of recommendations every day, Nettle is a rewards platform that pays users cash for the recommendations they make to their friends. For businesses, Nettle offers customer acquisition at a set cost incentivising and capturing true word of mouth.


-------------

Where We’re At?

We’ve been revenue generating since the first day our web-based MVP was soft launched a few months ago. We’re now in the process of raising seed capital and have investment committed to accelerate our growth , develop the product & grow the team.

-------------

The Role

We are looking for someone to join as a Technical Co-founder & CTO to fundamentally shape & built our main product offerings while managing all aspects of the technology side of the business. As a cofounder you be key in decision making across the business, beyond just its technical development.

While your responsibilities as a co-founder will be wide-reaching, the early priorities on the technology side will be in building on the web-based MVP and in building & launching a mobile application. You would join the current full-time co-founders Edley (Product & Operations) & Gabriel (Sales & Marketing), a small advisory board & occasional part-time/freelancers working out of a co-working hub near Old Street tube station in London.

-------------

Applicants must:

- Have experience building & launching web & mobile applications
- Be driven, independent, and passionate about entrepreneurship & early-stage startups

We love applicants that:

- Have startup experience (whether an ex-founder or having worked in an early-stage startup)
- Have worked in/around affiliate/influencer/referral marketing
- Already live in London or are willing to move to London (or close by) in the future

We are open to:

- Full time (45+ hrs/week) or part-time commitment (we're open to your suggestions)
- You persuading us that you’re the right person, whatever your background & experience
-------------

What We Offer

- The opportunity to become the cofounder of a fast growing tech for good startup
- A generous equity package (experience based)
- Salary at the raise and expenses before (experience based)
- Flexible working (you can work on a flexible schedule & you can work remotely and out of our coworking space in London)

All applications/enquiries will be responded to in the strictest confidence. If you have any questions about Nettle or the role, just leave them in your application!
